Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character.  \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. All in all, I would recommend this\n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. All in all, I would recommend this \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. Heartwar All in all, I would recommend this to someone \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to\n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing, it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. ? It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated, and I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie and it was rather. entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. The acting was decent and the some of the editing and transitions got a laugh out of me, very 2000s. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and it was rather entertaining to watch. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? Well, I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I didn't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. It really irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. Heartwarming. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. The acting was decent and the some of the editing and transitions got a laugh out of me, very 2000s. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well.? The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well. I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I don't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. The end was heartwar. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. The acting was decent and the some of the editing and transitions got a laugh out of me, very 2000s. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well. I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I don't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. The end was heartwarming, again, good way to end a movie. Th. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well. I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I don't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. The end was heartwarming, a good way to end a movie yet . All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to. \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. I really liked the 2000s vibe. The acting was decent and the some of the editing and transitions got a laugh out of me, very 2000s. I enjoyed the music even though I'm not a huge fan of the genre. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well. I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I don't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. The end was heartwarming, a good way to end a movie yet slightly cliched. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to on a \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched. The lead actress was Mariah Carey but I am not sure if it was her personal story. The colour grading in the start of the movie was very intriguing; it was a flashback and the colours were very desaturated. I was wondering how it would set the tone for the rest of the movie. It didn't seem like it was going to be a boring movie right from the start and I knew I would enjoy it. The title is rather apt and reminds me of the phrase, 'All that glitters is not gold,' which refers to a pop star's life well. I don't know if it was gold but it was entertaining enough to make me want to sit through it. It was a one time watch, but I don't think it would be a movie I'd like to watch again. It irritated me that the protagonist did not speak for herself but maybe it was just the character. The end was heartwarming, a good way to end a movie yet slightly cliched. All in all, I would recommend this to someone who wants to watch something light and dramatic to eat popcorn to on a boring night \n\n\n\n","Glitter \nIt was a fun movie, even though I felt that the plot was rather cliched.
